subject: Bahasa Malaysia

overview.description: Comprehensive Bahasa Malaysia curriculum integrating scientific communication, technical writing, and cultural appreciation for Pure Science students

learning_objectives: Develop advanced proficiency in scientific and technical Malay writing
Master formal presentation and communication skills
Understand scientific literature and terminology in Bahasa Malaysia
Appreciate Malaysian literary heritage and cultural values
Apply language skills to scientific contexts and research communication

units.title: Bahasa Ilmiah dan Teknikal (Scientific and Technical Language)
learning_outcomes: Master scientific terminology and technical vocabulary
Write clear and precise scientific reports
Understand scientific text structure and conventions
Communicate scientific concepts effectively in Bahasa Malaysia

lessons.title: Istilah Saintifik dan Pembentukan Kata
objectives: Understand scientific term formation in Bahasa Malaysia
Apply morphological rules to create scientific vocabulary
Use scientific dictionaries and terminology databases

activities.description: Explore scientific terms across different fields (physics, chemistry, biology)
Practice creating scientific terms using prefixes, suffixes, and root words
Use Dewan Bahasa dan Pustaka scientific dictionaries effectively
Apply new terminology in scientific contexts

lessons.title: Penulisan Laporan Saintifik
objectives: Structure scientific reports following standard conventions
Write clear methodology and results sections
Use appropriate scientific language register

activities.description: Analyze structure and language of exemplary scientific reports
Write sections of scientific report based on lab experiment
Review and provide feedback on peer reports
Revise reports based on feedback received

units.title: Kemahiran Komunikasi dan Persembahan
learning_outcomes: Master formal debate and argumentation skills
Adapt communication style to different audiences

lessons.title: Persembahan Saintifik dan Akademik
objectives: Structure scientific presentations effectively
Use appropriate visual aids and technology
Engage audience through clear delivery

activities.description: Plan structure and content for scientific presentation
Practice presentation delivery with focus on voice and body language
Create and use digital presentation tools effectively
Receive and respond to audience questions and feedback

lessons.title: Perdebatan dan Perbincangan Akademik
objectives: Construct logical arguments using evidence
Participate effectively in formal debates
Analyze and counter opposing arguments

activities.description: Learn to build logical arguments with scientific evidence
Research and prepare for scientific debate topics
Participate in structured debate on scientific/environmental issues
Analyze debate performance and argument effectiveness

cross_curricular_connections: Science subjects: Scientific reasoning and evidence

units.title: Kesusasteraan Malaysia dan Apresiasi Budaya
learning_outcomes: Analyze Malaysian literary works and their cultural significance
Understand historical and social contexts of literature
Connect literary themes to contemporary scientific and social issues

lessons.title: Novel dan Tema Kontemporari
objectives: Analyze themes in contemporary Malaysian novels
Understand character development and literary techniques
Connect literary themes to current social issues

activities.description: Close reading and analysis of selected novel excerpts
Group discussion on themes and their relevance to modern society
Write creative response connecting literature to scientific or environmental themes
Share creative responses and discuss connections

cross_curricular_connections: Environmental Science: Environmental themes in literature

lessons.title: Puisi dan Ekspresi Budaya
objectives: Appreciate poetic forms and literary devices
Understand cultural expressions in Malaysian poetry
Create original poetry reflecting personal and cultural identity

activities.description: Analyze traditional and modern Malaysian poetry
Identify and analyze use of metaphor, symbolism, and imagery
Write original poems incorporating learned techniques
Recite poems with attention to rhythm and expression

cross_curricular_connections: Music: Rhythm and meter in poetry

units.title: Penyelidikan dan Penulisan Akademik
learning_outcomes: Conduct academic research using various sources
Write scholarly papers with proper citations
Understand research ethics and academic integrity

lessons.title: Metodologi Penyelidikan dan Sumber
objectives: Identify and evaluate reliable academic sources
Develop effective research strategies
Apply proper citation and referencing methods

activities.description: Evaluate credibility and relevance of various sources
Develop research plan for academic investigation
Practice proper citation formats and bibliography creation
Discuss plagiarism and academic integrity

lessons.title: Penulisan Kertas Kerja Akademik
objectives: Structure academic papers effectively
Integrate sources and evidence appropriately
Write clear abstracts and conclusions

activities.description: Analyze structure of exemplary academic papers
Write sections of academic paper with instructor guidance
Provide structured feedback on peer papers
Plan revisions based on feedback received

textbooks: Bahasa Malaysia untuk Sains Tulen - Dewan Bahasa dan Pustaka

differentiation_strategies: Flexible topic choices for research projects
Scaffolded writing support for different proficiency levels

cross_curricular_integration.history: Cultural and historical contexts in literature
cross_curricular_integration.information_technology: Digital literacy and online research skills
